Reviews.Title: Don't waste your time
Reviews.Author: Jeanette J. Johnson "Slick Chick"
Reviews.Content: Phone began to give problems in less than six months. Not worth it at all. Find something better and pay a little more for better quality

Reviews.Title: A great user friendly phone
Reviews.Author: Avid reader "avid reader"
Reviews.Content: If you don't need a big fancy phone but one that does nearly as much in a much simpler way, this is the one for you!

Reviews.Title: NIce
Reviews.Author: Maribel Soto
Reviews.Content: It is perferct to me, it is easy to use, the camera it is excelent! I love it. If I need a New one I buy a similar

Reviews.Title: One of the worst phones I have ever purchased
Reviews.Author: Balu
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for a phone just for texting and receiving calls, Go for it.The display and the touch sensitivity is good  for a phone in this price range.I have tried to download few basic apps for the phone but I couldn't connect to Samsung apps; there are many bugs in the Samsung Bada OS.

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
2G Network: GSM 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900 - 3G Network: HSDPA 900 / 2100
Bada OS, v2.0; TFT capacitive touchscreen; TouchWiz UI; GPS Navigation with A-GPS support
Bluetooth v3.0 with A2DP; Wi-Fi 802.11 b/g/n, Wi-Fi Direct, Wi-Fi hotspot
2 Megapixel Camera; Video HVGA@30fps; microSD Slot up to 32GB; Stereo FM radio with RDS
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung Wave Y (Young) S5380 Unlocked GSM Phone with Bada OS 2.0, Touchscreen, Wi-Fi, A-GPS, 2MP Camera, NFC, Bluetooth and microSD Slot - Sand Silver
